name: WRFWNewsFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Get local news specific to western Wisconsin from the WRFW, based at the University of Wisconsin-River Falls simply by saying "Alexa, what's in the news?". WRFW News produces a daily newscast with top headlines from the UW-River Falls Journalism students with Falcon News Service and Wisconsin Public Radio.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
